item.title: [508] please help!
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

try this,

if (cmd[0].equals("muteuser") && (p.rights == 2)) { String victim = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(victim)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.muteType++; p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You have successfuly muted "+victim+"."); p.updateReq = true; p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
